thread.title: Client
thread.title_full: Canada Aventure Motoneige reviewed by Client

author: Client
title: Client
text:
Once you're out of the plane you're totally taken care of.
I had a wonderful experience.
Everything was perfect, brand new skidoo, confortable bed in friendly warm "pourvoiries". The food was excellent.
The guide, Gilles Lemieux, was exceptional, a perfect mix of humour, patience and calm that make you gain confidance on the snow.
A real perhaps too short break out of everyday life.
